lead_paragraph: BRESLIN--Rev. John B.,S.J., on March 21. Beloved brother of Patrick Breslin, of Washington, DC. Reposing at the Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, 515 E. Fordham Rd., Bronx, NY on Monday, 3-5 and 7-8:30pm. Funeral Mass at the Murray-Wejgel Hall Chapel, Tuesday, 11:30am. Interment at the Jesuit Cemetery, Auriesville, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northeast Province of the Society of Jesus, 39 E. 83rd St., New York, NY 10028. For information, contact Farenga Bros., Inc. Directors (718) 654-0500. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BRESLIN, REV. JOHN B.
